data.title: Critical Software Summit (Seattle, Wa)
data.meta_description: The Safety-Critical Software Summit will be hosted in Seattle, Washington on April 16-18. As open source is found more and more in safety-critical applications, the need to evaluate open source...
data.text:
The Safety-Critical Software Summit will be hosted in Seattle, Washington on April 16-18. As open source is found more and more in safety-critical applications, the need to evaluate open source software that meets safety standards has increased. This event, sponsored by ELISA, gathers safety experts and open source developers to enable and advance the use of open source in safety-critical applications.

The safety-critical track will take place on Thursday, April 18.

Add these to your schedule here. Register here.
